text: Malcolm Thomas (born November 8, 1988) is an American professional basketball player who currently plays for the Chicago Bulls of the NBA. Thomas was born on November 8, 1988 in Columbus, Missouri. He studied at Crawford High School. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:African- American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Philadelphia 76ers players Category:Power forwards Category:San Antonio Spurs players Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Missouri Category:Sportspeople from San Diego Category:Utah Jazz players
title: Malcolm Thomas
